PackageOracle.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_DSCNT_XREF
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_DSCNT_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.441998000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_product_discount_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_product_discount_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref;

body.name: DA_BILLING_PROD_DSCNT_XREF
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_DSCNT_XREF
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.465326000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_product_discount_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref.add, parms=' || billed_product_discount_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_dscnt_xref a
(
a.billed_product_discount_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billed_product_discount_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billed_product_discount_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref.del, parms=' || billed_product_discount_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_prod_dscnt_xref a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billed_product_discount_cd = del.billed_product_discount_cd
AND a.data_source_type_cd = del.data_source_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref.del');

END del;

END da_billing_prod_dscnt_xref;
